channel.title: Making sign saying: "Pk mode off/on"
channel.description:
I need help trying to make a sign on top of the screen, to where like it says when PK mode is on and when its OFF.
=Please Help=

item.title: Making sign saying: "Pk mode off/on"
item.dc:creator: @vraj82192 vraj82192
item.description:
@vraj82192 wrote:

EDIT:

Got it to work.

Thanks to I Am Noob

Always very helpful

Read full topic

item.title: Making sign saying: "Pk mode off/on"
item.dc:creator: @vraj82192 vraj82192
item.description:
@vraj82192 wrote:

Awsome, thanks.

RE-EDIT: Everything works fine, I Am Noob helped me out. Thanks wooker for the help too.

I got one error… :eek:

Illegal start of expression.

Public Void writePlayers ()

(By the way I addded it right after the " } " for Public Void Weather.

Meaning it looks like this…

public void weather() { if (hour24 > 6 && hour24 <= 12) { nightTime = false; eveningTime = false; afternoonTime = false; morningTime = true; setTime(); }

if (hour24 > 12 && hour24 <= 18)
{ nightTime = false;
eveningTime = false;
morningTime = false;
afternoonTime = true;
setTime();
}

if (hour24 > 18 && hour24 <= 23)
{
nightTime = false;
morningTime = false;
afternoonTime = false;
eveningTime = true;
setTime();
}

if (hour24 > 0 && hour24 <= 6)
{
morningTime = false;
eveningTime = false;
afternoonTime = false;
nightTime = true;
setTime();
}

public void writePlayers()
{
int players = PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount();
if (pkStatus == true) {
sendFrame126("@red@ .-’@whi@Pk Mode is on!@red@’-.", 6570);
sendFrame126("@gre@Players Online: " + players, 6572);
sendFrame126("", 6664);
setInterfaceWalkable(6673);
} else if (pkStatus == false) {
sendFrame126("@gre@ .-’@gre@Pk Mode is off!@gre@’-.", 6570);
sendFrame126("@gre@Players Online: " + players, 6572);
sendFrame126("", 6664);
setInterfaceWalkable(6673);
}

}

First part is the weather void, and secound the one you told me to add.

Read full topic

item.title: Making sign saying: "Pk mode off/on"
item.dc:creator: @wooker wooker
item.description:
@wooker wrote:

Firstly add this boolean somewhere public boolean pkStatus = false; then add this in pkon command pkStatus = true; and add this in pkoff command pkStatus = false; Now add a writePlayers void if you havnt got it… this is it. public void writePlayers() { int players = PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount(); if (pkStatus == true) { sendFrame126("@red@ .-'@whi@Pk Mode is on!@red@'-.", 6570); sendFrame126("@gre@Players Online: " + players, 6572); sendFrame126("", 6664); setInterfaceWalkable(6673); } else if (pkStatus == false) { sendFrame126("@gre@ .-'@gre@Pk Mode is off!@gre@'-.", 6570); sendFrame126("@gre@Players Online: " + players, 6572); sendFrame126("", 6664); setInterfaceWalkable(6673); } Then search boolean process() and add this inside writePlayers();

Read full topic
